resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107169</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107169</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205857</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Marco Paul's Travels on the Erie Canal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Marco Pauls Spielräume auf dem Erie Kanal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyages de Marco Paul sur le canal d'Erie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cursos de Marco Paul no canal de erie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corse di Marco Paul sul canale di Erie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδια Paul Marco στο κανάλι του Erie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recorridos de Marco Paul en el canal de Erie</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a lesson plan that draws on photos, texts, and other sources to help students learn about the Erie Canal and its impact on the economic and social growth of New York and the nation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein Lektionplan, der auf Fotos, Texte und 
andere Quellen zeichnet, um Kursteilnehmern zu helfen, über den Erie 
Kanal und seine Auswirkung auf das ökonomische und Sozialwachstum von
New York und von Nation zu erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un plan de leçon qui dessine sur des photos, 
des textes, et d'autres sources pour aider des étudiants à se 
renseigner sur le canal d'Erie et son impact sur la croissance 
économique et sociale de New York et de la nation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma planta da lição que desenhe em fotos, em 
textos, e em outras fontes para ajudar a estudantes aprender sobre o 
canal de erie e seu impacto no crescimento econômico e social de New 
York e da nação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un programma di lezione che attingere dalle 
foto, dai testi e da altre fonti per aiutare gli allievi ad imparare 
circa il canale di Erie ed il relativo effetto sullo sviluppo 
economico e sociale di New York e della nazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος που επισύρει την προσοχή 
στις φωτογραφίες, τα κείμενα, και άλλες πηγές για να βοηθήσει 
τους σπουδαστές να μάθουν για το κανάλι του Erie και τον 
αντίκτυπό του στην οικονομική και κοινωνική αύξηση της Νέας 
Υόρκης και του έθνους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un plan de la lección que traza en las fotos, 
los textos, y otras fuentes para ayudar a estudiantes a aprender sobre
el canal de Erie y su impacto en el crecimiento económico y social de
Nueva York y de la nación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205857</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107169</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/marco-pauls-travels-on-the-erie-canal</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
